cards.title: Bitch
powers: Each Dog in play may deal 2 melee damage to a target.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may take a card from their trash into their hand.
Reduce damage dealt by environment targets by 2 until the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Heel!
body: Reveal cards from the top of either your deck or your trash until you reveal a Dog. Put it into play. Return the other cards and shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: Master only asks for dogs{br}to come to the front stairs{BR}if it is time for walkies!

cards.title: Find!
body: Reveal the top X cards of a deck, where X = the number of Dog cards in play + 2. For each target revealed in this way, either discard it or put it into play. Shuffle the other cards back into the deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Find her! Find Skitter! Hurt! Kill!

cards.title: Guard!
body: Select up to X targets, where X = the number of Dog cards in play. Reduce damage dealt to those targets by 2 until the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Hold!
body: Destroy a target with up to X HP, where X = the number of Dog cards in play * 2.
cards.flavorText: The dog lurched forward{BR}and placed both front paws on{BR}Mannequin's body

cards.title: Kill!
body: {BitchCharacter} deals a target X melee damage, where X = the number of Dog cards in play * 3.

cards.title: Fetch!
body: Reveal the top X cards of a deck, where X = the number of Dog cards in play + 2. For each equipment or device card revealed in this way, either discard it or put it into play. Shuffle the other cards back into the deck.
cards.flavorText: If only humans were as reliable,{BR}as easy to train.

cards.title: Veterinary Care
body: Restore all Dog cards to maximum HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Like this, his body won't just kill them,{BR}but it can kill the disease.{BR}He'll be fine by tomorrow.

cards.title: Whistle
body: At the start of your turn, you may draw a card.
At the end of your turn, you may play an Order card.
cards.flavorText: I could hear her whistle{BR}at a volume that I doubted{BR}I could scream.

cards.title: The Hunt
body: At the start of your turn, each Dog in play may deal 1 melee damage to a target.

flavorQuotes.text: If I ordered them to kill you,{BR}Brutus would have torn out your throat{BR}before you could scream.

cards.title: Have a Ride
body: Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by environment cards by 1.
cards.flavorText: Leaping from rooftop to rooftop{BR}was not as awesome or efficient as it was{BR}on TV and in the movies.

cards.title: Judas
cards.body: At the end of your turn, this card deals itself 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: The dog's prehensile tail{BR}wrapped around Aegis' torso.

cards.title: Angelica
cards.body: At the end of your turn, this card deals itself 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: Angelica positioned herself between{BR}enemy and master, and{BR}Glory Girl hit the dog broadside.

cards.title: Brutus
cards.body: At the end of your turn, this card deals itself 1 psychic damage.

cards.title: Kuro
cards.body: At the end of your turn, this card deals itself 1 psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Last one killed my dogs.{BR}When do we attack?

cards.title: Bullet
cards.body: At the end of your turn, this card deals itself 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: Leviathan pulled away,{BR}only for a dog to snag his arm,{BR}drag him off balance.

cards.title: Ginger
cards.body: At the end of your turn, this card deals itself 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: KOOROW BULLIT MILK STUMPY{BR}BROOTUS JOODUS AXIL GINGIR

cards.title: Milk
cards.body: At the end of your turn, this card deals itself 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: All sorts of breeds,{BR}different sizes and shapes.

cards.title: Stumpy
cards.body: At the end of your turn, this card deals itself 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: I fell, and in a heartbeat,{BR}the other two dogs were on me.

cards.title: Axel
cards.body: At the end of your turn, this card deals itself 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: ...resembling a cross between a lizard{BR}and a tiger, with tangles of muscle{BR}and bone where it ought to have skin
